member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStyleManager
member.summary: Encapsulates an attached behavior that propagates styles in a framework element's associated resource dictionary to its children. The class also provides attached properties that allow the resource dictionary to be loaded from an external source. Hierarchical styling is supported in a way similar to WPF.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStyleManager.GetHasBeenStyled(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: Gets the value of the HasBeenStyled attached property for a specified FrameworkElement.
member.param: The FrameworkElement from which the property value is read.
member.returns: The HasBeenStyled property value for the FrameworkElement.

member.summary: Sets the value of the HasBeenStyled attached property to a specified FrameworkElement.
member.param: The FrameworkElement to which the attached property is written.

member.summary: Identifies the HasBeenStyled dependency property.

member.param: The FrameworkElement from which the property value is read.
member.returns: The ApplyMode property value for the FrameworkElement.

member.summary: Sets the value of the ImplicitStyleManager.ApplyMode attached property on a specified framework element. This value indicates whether the style should be implicitly applied on descendent framework elements.
member.param: The FrameworkElement to which the attached property is written.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStyleManager._useApplicationResources
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use application resources.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStyleManager._applicationResourceDictionaryUri
member.summary: A field that stores a resource dictionary uri which is used to retrieve resources associated with the application.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStyleManager.Apply(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: Applies implicit styles to an element and its descendents.
member.param: The element to apply implicit styles to.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStyleManager.GetMergedStyleDictionary(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: Retrieves or creates the merged style dictionary of an element.
member.returns: The merged dictionary of the element.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStyleManager.GetStyleKey(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: Retrieves the style key for a given element by first checking to see if it can retrieve its default style key and then using the full name of its concrete type.
member.param: The element to retrieve the style key for.
member.returns: The style key.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStyleManager.Parse(System.Uri)
member.summary: Retrieves a style collection from a uri of a resource dictionary.
member.param: The uri of a resource dictionary.
member.returns: A style collection containing the styles in the resource dictionary.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStyleManager.PropagateStyles(System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method propagates the styles in the resources associated with a framework element to its descendents. This results in a style inheritance that mimics WPF's behavior.
member.param: The element that will have its styles propagated to its children.
Whether to recurse over styled elements that are set to OneTime and have already been styled.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStyleManager.UseApplicationResources
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the implicitly applied styles are based on values from ImplicitStyleManager.ApplicationResourceDictionaryUri.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStyleManager.ApplicationResourceDictionaryUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the ResourceDictionary URI that is implicitly applied to all FrameworksElements in the Application.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStyleManager.ApplicationExternalResourceDictionary
member.summary: Gets or sets the external resource dictionary to use for the application.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStylesApplyMode
member.summary: Specifies the mode in which styles are implicitly applied in ImplicitStyleManager.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStylesApplyMode.None
member.summary: Specifies that the ImplicitStyleManager does not implicitly apply styles.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStylesApplyMode.OneTime
member.summary: Specifies that the ImplicitStyleManager will implicitly apply styles to the descendent visual tree once and will not attempt refreshes.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ImplicitStylesApplyMode.Auto
member.summary: Specifies that the ImplicitStyleManager will implicitly apply styles to the descendent visual tree once the visual tree changes. Using this setting may incur a serious performance hit.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.VisualTreeExtensions
member.summary: A static class providing methods for working with the visual tree.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.VisualTreeExtensions.EnsureName(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: Ensures that a framework element has a unique name.
member.param: The element to set the name of.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.VisualTreeExtensions.GetVisualAncestors(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: Returns the visual tree ancestors of an element.
member.returns: The visual tree ancestors of the element.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.VisualTreeExtensions.GetLogicalChildrenDepthFirst(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: Retrieves all the logical children of a framework element using a depth-first search. A visual element is assumed to be a logical child of another visual element if they are in the same namescope. For performance reasons this method manually manages the stack instead of using recursion.
member.returns: The logical children of the framework element.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.VisualTreeExtensions.GetVisualChildren(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Retrieves all the visual children of a framework element.
member.returns: The visual children of the framework element.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.VisualTreeExtensions.UniqueId
member.summary: Gets or sets an identity integer that ensures that names are unique.

member.summary: Determine if the current element in the reader represents a Style whose TargetType has been loaded in the assembly.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the element is not a style or it is a Style with a TargetType loaded in this assembly.
